instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2879: What is 820-2879? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2879</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted to ground
threads.message:
i have a <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2879</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> that customer used someone elses charger, and there was damage on <TRANSISTOR>Q7080</TRANSISTOR> & F6905, <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> shorted to ground,
i injected power, and found the short, but the short went away partially, then injected power again at another point where <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> was still shorted, and it heated else where, removed that, and it seems to keep going,
<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> does not find the actual short, just partially, is this a dead board?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2879</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted to ground
threads.message:
Could be, if you inject voltage without minimal precautions!
NEVER ever inject voltage on <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> before checking for shorted high-side MOSFETs.
If not you may inject high voltage on the PCH, or CPU.

Which is the actual value of that "short".
What did you find and removed from board untill now?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2879</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted to ground
threads.message:
so far <CAPACITOR>C7280</CAPACITOR>, <CHIP>U7840</CHIP>, <CAPACITOR>C7330</CAPACITOR>, and that all, but <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> is still shorted

Diode mode 0.035

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2879</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted to ground
threads.message: Any big coil with similar value?
